description: Source file defining the NoteEditor component for a frontend application using LightningJS. It renders a note editing interface with title and content fields, handles state management, and communicates with notes service.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, including UI layout, state management, and autosave functionality.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Schedules an autosave of the note after a debounce period.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note state by calling updateNote; manages saving indicator and simulated delay.
